definition[0]: an infectious illness that makes your lymph nodes swell and makes you feel weak and tired for a long time afterwards
definition[1]: a system of recording or broadcasting sound, in which all the sound comes from only one direction
definition[2]: using a system of recording or broadcasting sound, in which all the sound comes from only one direction
example[1]: a monoplane  (=a plane with only one wing on each side)
example[2]: a monolingual dictionary  (=dealing with only one language)
